channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rams QB Matthew Stafford Mum on Future; Sean McVay Upset With Retirement Question
item.description: Matthew Stafford didn't indicate what's next for him, but Sean McVay was incredulous on the question of his quarterback's future.

item.title: 2026 Super Bowl Odds: Seahawks Favored Over Patriots
item.description: Only two teams remain. Here are the latest Super Bowl odds.

item.title: Sound Smart: 5 Observations from NFL Championship Sunday
item.description: Breaking down the biggest talking points from the conference title games and why the Seahawks and the Patriots advanced to Super Bowl LX.

item.title: 4 Takeaways from NFL Title Games: How the Patriots, Seahawks Earned Super Bowl Berths
item.description: Bucky Brooks breaks down the AFC and NFC Championship Games, with key insights on how the Patriots and Seahawks prevailed.

item.title: 2026 Super Bowl Odds: How Will Sam Darnold, Drake Maye Perform?
item.description: What do the odds say about what to expect from the two Super Bowl quarterbacks? See the latest.

item.title: Payton rues 4th-down call after stalling in snow
item.description: Broncos coach Sean Payton said he will find several "regrets'' in Sunday's AFC Championship Game loss to the Patriots, most notably when he passed up ...

item.title: The Patriots just showed us what it means to hire the right coach
item.description: New England just went from 4-13 in 2024 to the Super Bowl with Mike Vrabel.

item.title: Potential unexpected college stars from the boys' class of 2026
item.description: These five 2026 prospects are likely to have breakout college careers -- and they have precedent.

item.title: Inside Sean Payton's fourth-down Patriots-Broncos call
item.description: Behind the scenes with Denver Broncos coach Sean Payton, before and after his failed fourth-down decision.

item.title: Offensive battle leads to a Seahawks win, a berth to Super Bowl LX
item.description: Seattle defeats Los Angeles in the NFC Championship Game and advances to Super Bowl LX to face the Patriots.
